author: 王世堅
content:
針對網路上特定假帳號惡意造謠，王世堅辦公室強力譴責與說明如下： 所有台灣的疫情相關資訊，防疫中心均有公開上網，阿堅從未與任何人討論過造謠者所提及之疫情內容，請造謠者自重！依《傳染病防治法》第63條規定，若散播有關傳染病流行疫情之謠言或不實訊息，足生損害於公眾或他人者，科新台幣300萬元以下罰金。 王世堅辦公室 本網路造謠案，阿堅第一時間已與調查局聯繫，相關資料移交調查局。調查局證實此為境外網軍所為，2020年03月03日刑事局也破獲另起造謠案，阿堅聲明所有網路言論均只會發布於粉絲專頁與本人帳號。 《別再傳了！武漢肺炎6大謠言　調查局：疑陸網軍散布》
2020年02月26日蘋果日報記者游仁汶／新北報導

author: Mohammed Ali
content: What is the Corona/ Covid-19 Virus Really Teaching us? I’m a strong believer that there is a spiritual purpose behind everything that happens  whether that is what we perceive as being good or being bad. As I meditate upon this  I want to share with you what I feel the Corona/ Covid-19 virus is really doing to us: - It is reminding us that we are all equal  regardless of our culture  religion  occupation  financial situation or how famous we are. This disease treats us all equally  perhaps we should to. If you don’t believe me  just ask Tom Hanks. - It is reminding us that we are all connected and something that affects one person has an effect on another. It is reminding us that the false borders that we have put up have little value as this virus does not need a passport. It is reminding us  by oppressing us for a short time  of those in this world whose whole life is spent in oppression. - It is reminding us of how precious our health is and how we have moved to neglect it through eating nutrient poor manufactured food and drinking water that is contaminated with chemicals upon chemicals. If we don’t look after our health  we will  of course  get sick. - It is reminding us of the shortness of life and of what is most important for us to do  which is to help each other  especially those who are old or sick. Our purpose is not to buy toilet roll. - It is reminding us of how materialistic our society has become and how  when in times of difficulty  we remember that it’s the essentials that we need (food  water  medicine) as opposed to the luxuries that we sometimes unnecessarily give value to. - It is reminding us of how important our family and home life is and how much we have neglected this. It is forcing us back into our houses so we can rebuild them into our home and to strengthen our family unit. - It is reminding us that our true work is not our job  that is what we do  not what we were created to do. Our true work is to look after each other  to protect each other and to be of benefit to one another. - It is reminding us to keep our egos in check. It is reminding us that no matter how great we think we are or how great others think we are  a virus can bring our world to a standstill. - It is reminding us that the power of freewill is in our hands. We can choose to cooperate and help each other  to share  to give  to help and to support each other or we can choose to be selfish  to hoard  to look after only our self. Indeed  it is difficulties that bring out our true colours. - It is reminding us that we can be patient  or we can panic. We can either understand that this type of situation has happened many times before in history and will pass  or we can panic and see it as the end of the world and  consequently  cause ourselves more harm than good. - It is reminding us that this can either be an end or a new beginning. This can be a time of reflection and understanding  where we learn from our mistakes  or it can be the start of a cycle which will continue until we finally learn the lesson we are meant to. - It is reminding us that the true heroes are not the movie stars or sports stars that we put on a pedestal  but the doctors  nurses  care-workers etc. that dedicate their lives to helping people on a daily basis. - It is reminding us that this Earth is sick. It is reminding us that we need to look at the rate of deforestation just as urgently as we look at the speed at which toilet rolls are disappearing off of shelves. We are sick because our home is sick. - It is reminding us that after every difficulty  there is always ease. Life is cyclical  and this is just a phase in this great cycle. We do not need to panic; this too shall pass. Whereas many see the Corona/ Covid-19 virus as a great disaster  I prefer to see it as a great corrector. It is sent to remind us of the important lessons that we seem to have forgotten and it is up to us if we will learn them or not.

author: Himadri Barman
content: Yellowest journalism of the day. Thanks PTI and other media for making me "famous" and people of this nation scared. Today I got discharged from the Beliaghata ID Hospital with all tests coming out to be negative. Also  listen  it's not that the Airport found me sick with symptoms and their thermal scanning detected high temperature in my body. It's me who wanted to volunteer in the process of diagnosing the possibility of the novel #Coronavirus aka #nCOV. I know better than you what happens or happened inside the hospital. And I've a good knowledge and understanding of science. Also  how do you dare to publish the names? Sensible friends  please don't hesitate to contact if any of your friend's name appears dubiously in the news. And share if you think this kind of rumor can harm a person's life. Any lawyer who wants to make a fortune by filing a defamation case? Any if any sensible medium still surviving wants to take an interview? Let me know  else I'm enough to fight against this kind of journalism. Thanks. (No thanks to the media people who don't want to side with me. Yes  I'm angry.)

author: DILG Philippines
content: BE INFORMED | An infographic is being widely shared on social media claiming that the DILG has imposed a 14-day quarantine on travelers arriving from 20+ countries affected by the novel Coronavirus. We would like to clarify that the said infographic was not issued by this Department and that our policy  as of today  is that the strict implementation of the 14-day quarantine provided in DILG Memo Circular 2020-023 (Amended Guide to Action against the 2019 Novel Coronavirus) refer only to travelers from China  Hong Kong and Macau. All other travelers from other nCoV-affected countries may undergo voluntary quarantine. We wish to advise the public to only follow official announcements that are posted in the DILG website (www.dilg.gov.ph) and official DILG social media accounts (DILG Philippines). Please be guided accordingly. Thank you.

author: Mak Mohamed
content: China#muslim#prayer#eid#ramazan#mak#makmohamed The fast  prayer and other religious freedom banned in China...? Think twice before forwarding such false and fake news...! Traffic and roads are diverted and the cops are trying to ensure the believers to perform their prayers even on the road. Have seen in India or elsewhere? can you see anywhere in the world? Stop: forwarding the false and fake news without knowing the truths ... This country is giving every rights to every individual to perform their religious freedom but strictly against terrorism... Yes  this is why this country is upfront of all above the universe...! I can authentically say that and confirm since I am living here for 17 years. And also surely affirm that no any other foreigner living in China with different opinion... My Chinese friends always considered me as a friend  brother  a foreigner.. but never considered me or evaluated me as an American  European  Indian  Pakistani  bangali etc.  for them I am a foreigner... You can see the discrimination around the Arab world and other countries as hindi  bangali  paki etc.  Here we have all equal rights as a foreigner...  I appreciate and salute the nation and the people of China... We have to learn a lots from #ചൈന#നോമ്പ് # #നിസ്കാരം#മുസ്ലിം#ഇസ്ലാം#മാക് ചൈനയിൽ നോമ്പും നിസ്കാരവും പെരുന്നാളും എല്ലാം നിഷേധിക്കുന്നു എന്ന വാർത്തകൾ പ്രചരിപ്പിക്കുന്നവർ ഇതൊന്നു കാണുക...! സ്വയം വിലയിരുത്തുക...!!! ട്രാഫിക്കുകളും  റോഡുകളും ഡൈവേർട് ചെയ്തു വിട്ട് വിശ്വാസികൾക്ക് പ്രാര്ഥനക്കുള്ള സൗക്സര്യം ചെയ്തു കൊടുക്കുന്ന പോലീസ് വ്യൂഹത്തിനെ ഒന്ന് കാണുക..! അഭിനന്ദിക്കാതിരുന്നു കൂടാ... ഇന്ത്യയിൽ  അല്ല...ലോകത്ത്‌ എവിടെയെങ്കിലും ഇങ്ങിനെ നിങ്ങൾക്ക് കാണാൻ സാധിച്ചിട്ടുണ്ടോ...? ഒരഭ്യർത്ഥന...! കാര്യങ്ങൾ അറിയാതെ മറ്റുള്ളവർ പടച്ചു വിടുന്ന മെസ്സേജുകൾ ഫോർവേഡ് ചെയ്യാതിരിക്കുക...! ഈ രാജ്യം എല്ലാവർക്കും തുല്യ നീതി ഉറപ്പാക്കുന്നുണ്ടെന്ന്പതിനേഴ് വർഷമായി ഇവിടെ  ഈ ചൈനീസ് സഹോദരന്മാരുടെ   സമൂഹത്തിന്റെ കൂടെ ജീവിക്കുന്ന എനിക്കും  മറ്റെല്ലാ രാജ്യങ്ങളിൽ നിന്നും വന്നു ഇവിടെ ജീവിക്കുന്ന എല്ലാ മതസ്ഥർക്കും വിഭിന്ന അഭിപ്രായങ്ങൾ ഉണ്ടാവില്ല...തീർച്ച...!!! ഈ നാടിനെയും നാട്ടുകാരെയും എത്ര സ്തുതിച്ചാലും മതിയാവില്ല...!!!

author: 香港警察 Hong Kong Police
content:
【 誣衊警務人員私吞口罩 】 近日，有人在社交媒體上載照片，誣衊警務人員從警署取得政府製造的口罩私用，引起網民非議。 經查證後，相關照片早於2018年已經上載互聯網。在全港各界同心抗疫的重要關頭，大家理應攜手合作，可惜別有用心的人再次以假消息針對及攻擊警隊，煽動仇警情緒，意圖分化社會！ 警方強調，各政府部門均按職能需要獲分發口罩。目前警隊為前線人員提供的保護裝備，如口罩及保護衣等，僅可應付日常工作需要，警隊並無囤積存貨。警隊會適當調派和善用有限資源，以確保向市民提供的緊急服務不受影響。 Recently  some people have uploaded photos of Government-produced face masks onto social media and accused Police officers of misappropriating these from police stations for personal use  which led to a public outcry. Upon verification  the photos concerned were actually circulated online back in 2018. As the entire society is fighting hard together against the epidemic  it is regrettable that ill-intentioned people once again disseminated bogus information to discredit the Force  incite hatred towards Police officers and create divisive views in the society. The Police stress that each Government department is supplied with its share of face masks in accordance to its functions. In fact  the current amount of protective gears such as face masks and protective clothing given to front-line Police officers can barely meet their daily operational needs  and the Force has not hoarded any internal resources. The Police has been frugal and prudent in utilizing their finite supplies  and will ensure that emergency services provided to citizens remain unaffected under existing circumstances. 市民報料，大陸鄉音女兜售政府CSI口罩，南昌站對出，開價$180一盒
政府逾億口罩送咗上大陸，啲人仲要拎番香港賣
香港政府無拉過一個人，點解可以仆街到咁？🤬🤬

author: Dettol UK
content:
31st January 2020 – Slough  UK – RB has become aware of speculation about Dettol products and the novel 2019-nCoV coronavirus. As this is an emerging outbreak RB  like all manufacturers  doesn't yet have access to the new virus (2019-nCoV) for testing and  as a result  are not yet in a position to confirm levels of effectiveness against the new strain. Our products have been tested against other coronaviruses (such as MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV) and have been found to kill those. Although 2019-nCoV is a new strain  this virus is very similar to other coronaviruses. We continue to work with our partners to ensure that we have the latest understanding of the virus  route of transmission and will test our product range once health authorities make the strain available.
As a global leader in health and hygiene  we continue to play our part in combating and containing the outbreak of the virus. To this end  we have donated £5.5 million in cash and products to assist in the mobilisation of medical staff to treat those affected and provide soap and hand sanitisers to hospitals in Wuhan to help contain the further spread of the virus. It is vital the accurate  evidenced-based information is conveyed to the public so they are properly informed about the importance of good hygiene at all times  but particularly during outbreaks.

Also the day Zerohedge posts this he gets taken down with almost 700k followers.
Ask yourself why they have been treating with HIV drugs from the start. A respected epidemiologist who recently caught flack for claiming in a twitter threat that the virus appeared to be much more contagious than initially believed is pointing out irregularities in the virus's genome that suggests it might have been genetically engineered for the purposes of a weapon. In "Uncanny similarity of unique inserts in the 2019-nCoV spike protein to HIV-1 gp120 and Gag"  Indian researchers are baffled by segments of the virus's RNA that have no relation to other coronaviruses like SARS  and instead appear to be closer to HIV. The virus even responds to treatment by HIV medications. https://www.zerohedge.com/geopolitical/coronavirus-contains-hiv-insertions-stoking-fears-over-artificially-created-bioweapon WOW update look what I came across 👀 - https://www.facebook.com/100000279322025/posts/3108359862516627/?d=n Wow look at this 👀 this furthers my research into this post - … More

author: Marcella Piper-Terry
content:
From the brilliance of Dr. James Lyons-Weiler:

"The available evidence most strongly supports that the 2019-NCoV virus is a vaccine strain of coronavirus either accidentally released from a laboratory accident  perhaps a laboratory researcher becoming infected with the virus while conducting animal experiments  or the Chinese were performing clinical studies of a Coronavirus vaccine in humans.

"Dr. Dale Brown brought to my attention the studies that have reported serious immunopathology in animals – rats  ferrets  and monkeys – in which animals vaccinated against coronoviruses tended to have extremely high rates of respiratory failure upon subsequent exposure in the study when challenged with the wild-type coronavirus."

"If the Chinese government has been conducting human trials against SARS. MERS  or other coronviruses using recombined viruses  they may have made their citizens far more susceptible to acute respiratory distress syndrome upon infection with 2019-nCoV coronavirus.

"The implications are clear: if China sensitized their population via a SARS vaccine  and this escaped from a lab  the rest of world has a serious humanitarian urgency to help China  but may not expect as serious an epidemic as might otherwise be expected.

"In the worst-case scenario  if the vaccination strain is more highly contagious and lethal  2019-nCoV could become the worst example of vaccine-derived contagious disease in human history. With an uncharacteristic aysmptomatic prodromal period of 5-7 days  individuals returning from China to other countries must be forthright and cooperative in their now-prescribed 2-week quarantine."

Here is the article:
https://jameslyonsweiler.com/2020/01/30/on-the-origins-of-the-2019-ncov-virus-wuhan-china/?fbclid=IwAR0STDEBq9pLBrnGlgmzNoMnPOf-DBBAfHW4-lWDVXSF_qL_cY-PX108Jao

author: Living Whole
content: CORONAVIRUS is not a new virus. It has been around for at least two decades and is transmitted from animals to humans and then from humans to humans. It is said to have originated from eating cats  bats  and camels (depending on the strain). 2019-nCoV is a supposedly new strain of the coronavirus that surfaced in mid-December 2019 from a seafood market in China. Now follow with me: In 2004  the CDC filed a patent on a newly isolated coronavirus known as SARS-CoV. It expired on January 24  2020 -- pure coincidence given the timing of this media outbreak I'm sure. In 2015  the Pirbright Institute filed a patent for a live attenuated coronavirus to be used in the production of vaccines. The Pirbright Institute is funded by the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation and recently received $5.5 million dollars to do what they do. They were "coincidentally chosen" to create the vaccine behind this current outbreak. They will be partnering with Inovio Pharmaceuticals  Inc. (funded by the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation) to create said vaccine. This company brought you the zika quackxine in a record-breaking 7 months (run ... just ... run). Inovio Pharmaceuticals will be partnering with Wistar (funded by Bill and Melinda Gates)  GeneOne (funded by Bill and Melinda Gates and sponsored by the US FDA) and Twist Biosciences (funded by the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation). If the Wistar Institute sounds familiar  it should. This is the company that produced the WI-38 cell line derived from the "too many to count" aborted fetuses in the vaccines injected into your children. In October of 2019  the John Hopkins Bloomberg School of Health (Center for Health Security) held "Event 201 " which simulated an outbreak of a theoretical coronavirus that ironically  looks exactly like what's playing out right now. It ultimately becomes a childhood disease for which we need to vaccinate against. Guess who it was funded by? The Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation. You really can't make this stuff up. Sources: https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/inovio-selected-by-cepi-to-develop-vaccine-against-new-coronavirus-300992131.html https://animalpharm.agribusinessintelligence.informa.com/AP016529/Pirbright-bags-55m-from-Gates-Foundation-to-establish-livestock-antibody-hub?fbclid=IwAR3sHqYmd2fGlAEMUgi7-pc23-kASPRApAuiGmKKjaWz1eEkiFgH1WRsHX4 http://www.genels.com/en/sub0201.php https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/summary.html https://www.ijidonline.com/article/S1201-9712(20)30011-4/fulltext https://www.businessinsider.com/microsoft-buys-dna-from-twist-bioscience-2016-4/lightbox?r=AU&IR=T&jwsource=cl http://www.centerforhealthsecurity.org/event201/scenario.html?fbclid=IwAR1jYT9U1xU0kQBrkC_afsVMlMl3bsfAhzQeqFuyXJGzUsmjAgFc4S2IW9g https://patents.google.com/patent/US7220852 https://patents.google.com/patent/EP3172319B1/en

author: Philippine Red Cross
content: PAANO SUOTIN ANG SURGICAL MASK? Siguruhing nakalabas ang asul o may-kulay na gilid. Nasa loob ang puti o absorbent upang panatilihing tuyo at hindi kulob ang mukha at bibig. Maging alisto laban sa #coronavirus ! Isang paalala mula sa Philippine Red Cross  upang tayo’y laging una  laging handa  at laging nariyan! #PRClifelineofthepeople #novelcoronavirus #ncov #Wuhan #sugicalmask #facemask ADDITIONAL INFO: A good quality surgical mask generally has a three-ply layer with the innermost white layer used for absorbing moisture  the middle layer is a filter  and outermost colored layer repels water. Surgical masks are made from fabric or polypropylene and should have a minimum of 80 percent bacteria filtration efficiency.

Coronavirus in Cina: 23 milioni di QUARANTINATI  2 8 milioni di infetti; 112.000 MORTI
23 gennaio 2020
Coronavirus in Cina: 23 milioni di QUARANTINATI  2 8 milioni di infetti; 112.000 MORTI
25 commenti
MOLTEPLICI AGGIORNAMENTI DAL PRIMO PUBBLICATO. . . VEDERE IN FONDO - Lo scoppio di un presunto nuovo coronavirus in Cina è completamente fuori controllo e sta uccidendo MIGLIAIA ogni giorno. A partire dalle 18:00 ora degli Stati Uniti orientali del 23 gennaio  fonti di informazioni segrete che sono ex miei colleghi dei miei 15 anni con l'FBI  gli ultimi cinque anni che gestiscono la sicurezza nazionale  il terrorismo e la controspionaggio straniera sulla task force congiunta sul terrorismo e che sono attualmente in Cina  confermano oltre 2 8 MILIONI di persone infette con centododomila (112.000) MORTI finora. Principale causa di morte: fallimento di più organi. Ciò si discosta selvaggiamente dal numero di PUBBLICAMENTE riportato di 830 infetti e 25 morti perché. . . pronto per questo. . . . . Un messaggio di un dottore in prima linea a Wuhan ha confermato che il motivo per cui il numero crescente di infetti è stato arrestato è dovuto al fatto che gli ospedali hanno esaurito i kit di test dei virus ... Le migliaia di morti vengono portate direttamente agli inceneritori. Nessun funerale. Nessuna sepoltura. Appena bruciato. Intel sta ottenendo i suoi effettivi conteggi di morte direttamente dagli operatori di inceneritori !!!!!! Le persone sono letteralmente "Dropping-Dead". Sui treni (prima della quarantena): Sulle strade: E qui: E anche qui: Sui piani ospedalieri in attesa di trattamento: Ora anche i dottori degli ospedali stanno letteralmente cadendo a terra morti: Il nuovo virus è diverso dalla SARS  in quanto provoca una rapida insufficienza renale. A partire da giovedì 23 gennaio  il governo cinese ha QUARANTINATO un totale di OTTO città: Wuhan  Huanggang  Ezhou  Chibi  Xiantao  Qianjiang  Zhijiang e Lichuan Oltre 20.000.000 di cittadini in totale.
